Pull request merge from GaelVaroquaux/nilearn:colorbar_connectome to nilearn/nilearn:master

text: OK, @KamalakerDadi has modified the whats_new. This is ready to merge. Please, one more review and merge away!
LGTM. I'll merge after lunch if CircleCI is happy :)
Tests to check plot_connectome with argument colorbar=True

ENH: proper positioning of colorbar

Misc changes to position the colorbar better

NAMING: _colorbar_show -> _show_colorbar

Our methods are called 'add_overlay', 'add_graph', 'add_edges', thus for
consistency, the colorbar plotting method should be called
'_show_colorbar'. As it's private, I am renaming it.

API: cmap and norm instead of im in _show_colorbar

Addresses @lesteve's comment on the fact that we are not always
passing images to _show_colorbar
documentation of whats new about colorbar

Merge pull request #1 from KamalakerDadi/gael-colorbar_connectome

documentation of whats new about colorbar
